name: HARcom
0:
”Alexa, start h. a. r. dot com”
”Tell me about the HOA”
”What appliances come with this home”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: h. a. r. dot com
Developer Terms of Use
des: The skill's purpose is to provide consumers with a voice-activated Real Estate search portal. HAR.com is the premier source of active homes for sale across Houston and surrounding counties. Consumers can search by a specific property address, zip code, or price range and receive detailed information on all properties for sale in short, informative sentences.
